entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
